user.title: Configure Homie Energy Core
user.description:
Select the sensors that represent your cumulative energy totals.

You may select multiple sensors per category.
Only select sensors with unit kWh or Wh. Do not select W (power) sensors.

Energy flows will be calculated using interval-based delta values.

data.imported_entities: Which sensor(s) measure energy imported from the grid?
data.exported_entities: Which sensor(s) measure energy exported to the grid?
data.produced_entities: Which sensor(s) measure total energy produced?
data.battery_charge_entities: Which sensor(s) measure total battery charge energy?
data.battery_discharge_entities: Which sensor(s) measure total battery discharge energy?
data.co2_intensity_entity: Which sensor provides CO₂ intensity (g CO₂-eq/kWh)?
data.presence_entity: Optional: which entity represents presence / occupancy?

forecaster.title: Forecaster Settings (Optional)
forecaster.description:
Configure weather sensors for the energy forecaster add-on.

These sensors provide data for the 15-minute energy use sensor that the forecaster uses.
Defaults are pre-filled for Open-Meteo.

error.invalid_unit: Only sensors with unit kWh or Wh are allowed. Do not select W (power) sensors.
error.invalid_energy_entities: One or more selected sensors are invalid energy meters: {entities}. Only cumulative kWh/Wh sensors are supported.
error.invalid_state_class: One or more sensors do not have a valid state_class (total or total_increasing).
error.invalid_device_class: One or more sensors do not have device_class 'energy'.
error.invalid_co2_unit: The selected CO₂ intensity sensor does not appear to use a unit per kWh (e.g. g CO₂/kWh).
error.invalid_config: The configuration is invalid. Please review the fields above.
